title: Khloe Kardashian, 35, shares cute photo of True in her crib
text:
Khloe Kardashian sure is one happy mommy.

On Wednesday the 35-year-old beauty shared two new photos of her one-year-old daughter True, who she has with basketball star ex-beau Tristan Thompson, smiling while in her crib.

And the siren, who stars on both Keeping Up With The Kardashians and Revenge Body, then shared a sexy photo of herself to her nearly 100M Instagram followers with big sunglasses as she remarked on her necklace from Armenia.

Her little bundle of joy: Khloe Kardashian sure is one happy mommy. On Wednesday the 35-year-old beauty shared two new photos of her one-year-old daughter True, who she has with basketball star ex-beau Tristan Thompson

Her baby: In her True post, she had two snaps stacked on top of each other. The child was still in her Lucite crib with a butterfly design in the background

In her True post, she had two snaps stacked on top of each other. The child was still in her Lucite crib with a butterfly design in the background.

Khloe is raising the toddler as a single parent ever since she split from Tristan in February, though the athlete seems to have visitation rights.

In her new self-portrait shared to her nearly 100M followers, she said: 'The Armenian Coat Of Arms around my neck.'

The star resembles a movie villain as she has on very big glasses and jewelry. She is in a lowcut grey top over a beige SKIMS bra.

Dressed to kill: And the siren, who stars on both Keeping Up With The Kardashians and Revenge Body, shared a sexy photo of herself with big sunglasses as she remarked on her necklace from Armenia

As she stated in her caption, she has on a necklace from Armenia. And she also has on very big hoop earrings.

Behind her is a car seat and a stuffed animal. There is no sign of True.

These posts come after her ex Lamar Odom talked dumping ex-girlfriend Taraji P Henson of Empire fame.

During a clip from the show Uncensored on TVOne, the former basketball great revealed he didn't end their relationship, which had once meant so much to him, very well.

In hindsight, the 39-year-old reality TV star says he wishes he had been more mature and just confessed to Taraji that he had fallen in love with another woman: Khloe.

Always together: Last week the E! star said True was the love of her life

'I wish I would have done things different with her,' Odom - who now dates personal trainer Sabrina Parr - said.

At 49, Taraji is 10 years older than Lamar.

'She was a little older than me, but I learned a lot from her because that was the most significant relationship as a grown-up that I had with a Black woman.'

His mother Cathy Mercer died of colon cancer when he was only 12-years-old.

And he seemed to be very much in love with Henson.

'I used to carry her picture on the road with me. Don't nobody know that, except for the dudes that played with me. She gave me inspiration. A Black woman working like that … that's just as good with her craft as I am in my craft,' he said.

When he was playing a game for the Cleveland Cavaliers - a team which Khloe's ex Tristan Thompson now plays for - he had Taraji on his mind and that helped the team win.

They clicked: Also on Wednesday, Lamar Odom talked his ex Taraji P Henson, whom he dumped in 2009 when he met Khloe. Seen in January 2009

His next gal: Khloe and Lamar Odom in LA in March 2010; they starred in the spinoff Khloe & Lamar and also made the fragrance Unbreakable together

'I remember we were on the road for our longest road trip and we were playing Cleveland. And I went off on their ass, but part of the inspiration of me going back to see her and getting back to L.A., was one of the reasons I kicked their ass that night. I remember how I was feeling during that game and after that game. She inspired me.'

But then Khloe entered the picture.

He fell fast and hard for the TV star who was famous from Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

But he never gave it straight to Taraji.

'Things ended with Taraji because of me being an immature punk, I didn't know how to tell her that I was falling in love with another woman named Khloe Kardashian.'

Odom's episode of TVOne's 'Uncensored' aires on Sunday, October 27 at 9 pm.
description: On Wednesday the 35-year-old beauty shared two new photos of her one-year-old daughter True, who she has with basketball star ex-beau Tristan Thompson.
